name: BitCard Ace of Hearts #1
description:
BitCard is a collection of 70 exclusive handmade pixel cards. Each card is magic and has one of the following rarities: Basic, Epic and Legendary. The Epic and Legendary cards are the most special ones, having unique details that are not found on Basic cards.

Existent cards by Rarity:
- Basic: 53
- Epic: 10
- Legendary: 7

The collection deck is composed by Hearts, Spades, Clubs and Diamonds.
